data.name: ReadCase
data.value: select T1.NUMB, T1.NO_JURISDICTION_CD from CKT_CASE T1 with(readuncommitted) where T1.NO_JURISDICTION_CD = ' ' and exists ( select * from CKT_CASE_ROLE T2 with(readuncommitted) where T1.NUMB = T2.CAS_NUMBER and @cspNumber1 = T2.CSP_NUMBER and T2.TYPE = 'AP' and T2.START_DATE <= @startDate and T2.END_DATE >= @startDate ) and exists ( select * from CKT_CASE_ROLE T3 with(readuncommitted) where T1.NUMB = T3.CAS_NUMBER and @cspNumber2 = T3.CSP_NUMBER and T3.TYPE = 'CH' and T3.START_DATE <= @startDate and T3.END_DATE >= @startDate )

data.name: ReadCollectionCsePersonDebtDetailCsePerson
data.value: select T1.COLL_ID, T1.APPLIED_TO_CD, T1.COLL_DT, T1.ADJ_IND, T1.CONCURRENT_IND, T1.CRT_TYPE, T1.CST_ID, T1.CRV_ID, T1.CRD_ID, T1.OBG_ID, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.OTR_ID, T1.OTR_TYPE, T1.OTY_ID, T1.COLL_ADJ_DT, T1.CREATED_TMST, T1.OB_TRN_AMT, T1.PGM_APPLD_TO, T1.CT_ORD_APPLIED_TO, T3.OBG_GENERATED_ID, T3.CPA_TYPE, T3.OTR_GENERATED_ID, T3.OTY_TYPE, T3.OTR_TYPE, T3.DUE_DT, T3.CREATED_TMST, T4.NUMB, T4.TYPE, T4.PAT_ESTAB_IND, T4.DATE_PATERN_ESTAB from CKT_COLLECTION T1 with(readuncommitted), CKT_DEBT_DTL T3 with(readuncommitted), CKT_CSE_PERSON T4 with(readuncommitted) where (T3.DUE_DT between cast(@date1 as date) and cast(@date2 as date)) and T1.CONCURRENT_IND = 'N' and ( T1.ADJ_IND = 'Y' and T1.COLL_ADJ_DT > @date2 or T1.ADJ_IND = 'N' ) and T1.APPLIED_TO_CD = 'C' and T1.CREATED_TMST < @createdTmst and T1.CRT_TYPE <> 2 and T1.CRT_TYPE <> 7 and exists ( select * from CKT_OB_TRN T5 with(readuncommitted) where T5.OTY_TYPE = T1.OTY_ID and T5.OB_TRN_TYP = T1.OTR_TYPE and T5.OB_TRN_ID = T1.OTR_ID and T5.CPA_TYPE = T1.CPA_TYPE and T5.CSP_NUMBER = T1.CSP_NUMBER and T5.OBG_GENERATED_ID = T1.OBG_ID and T5.OTY_TYPE = @otyType and T4.NUMB = T5.CSP_SUP_NUMBER and T5.OTY_TYPE = T3.OTY_TYPE and T5.OBG_GENERATED_ID = T3.OBG_GENERATED_ID and T5.OB_TRN_TYP = T3.OTR_TYPE and T5.OB_TRN_ID = T3.OTR_GENERATED_ID and T5.CPA_TYPE = T3.CPA_TYPE and T5.CSP_NUMBER = T3.CSP_NUMBER and T5.CSP_NUMBER > @cspNumber and T5.OB_TRN_TYP = 'DE' and T5.CPA_TYPE = 'R' and T5.CPA_SUP_TYPE = 'S' ) order by T1.CSP_NUMBER

data.name: ReadCsePerson
data.value: select T1.NUMB, T1.TYPE, T1.PAT_ESTAB_IND, T1.DATE_PATERN_ESTAB from CKT_CSE_PERSON T1 where ( T1.PAT_ESTAB_IND = 'Y' and T1.DATE_PATERN_ESTAB > @datePaternEstab or T1.PAT_ESTAB_IND = 'N' ) and exists ( select * from CKT_CASE_ROLE T2 where T1.NUMB = T2.CSP_NUMBER and T2.TYPE = 'CH' and T2.START_DATE <= @datePaternEstab and T2.END_DATE >= @datePaternEstab and T2.CAS_NUMBER = @casNumber )

data.name: ReadDashboardStagingPriority1
data.value: select REPORT_MONTH, RUN_NUMBER, CASE_NUMBER, AS_OF_DATE, CURRENT_CS_IND, OTHER_OBG_IND, CS_DUE_AMT, CS_COLLECTED_AMT, PAYING_CASE_IND, PATERNITY_EST_IND, ADDRESS_VER_IND, EMPLOYER_VER_IND from CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI_4 with(xlock) where RUN_NUMBER = @runNumber and REPORT_MONTH = cast(@reportMonth as integer) and CASE_NUMBER = @caseNumber

data.name: ReadDashboardStagingPriority2
data.value: select REPORT_MONTH, RUN_NUMBER, CASE_NUMBER, AS_OF_DATE, CURRENT_CS_IND, OTHER_OBG_IND, CS_DUE_AMT, CS_COLLECTED_AMT, PAYING_CASE_IND, PATERNITY_EST_IND, ADDRESS_VER_IND, EMPLOYER_VER_IND from CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI_4 where RUN_NUMBER = @runNumber and REPORT_MONTH = cast(@reportMonth as integer) and CURRENT_CS_IND = 'Y' and PAYING_CASE_IND = ' '

data.name: ReadDashboardStagingPriority3
data.value: select REPORT_MONTH, RUN_NUMBER, CASE_NUMBER, AS_OF_DATE, CURRENT_CS_IND, OTHER_OBG_IND, CS_DUE_AMT, CS_COLLECTED_AMT, PAYING_CASE_IND, PATERNITY_EST_IND, ADDRESS_VER_IND, EMPLOYER_VER_IND from CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI_4 where RUN_NUMBER = @runNumber and REPORT_MONTH = cast(@reportMonth as integer) and CURRENT_CS_IND = 'N' and OTHER_OBG_IND = 'N' and PATERNITY_EST_IND = ' '

data.name: ReadDebtDebtDetailCsePersonCsePersonObligation
data.value: select T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.OB_TRN_ID, T1.OB_TRN_TYP, T1.OB_TRN_AMT, T1.CREATED_TMST, T1.CSP_SUP_NUMBER, T1.CPA_SUP_TYPE, T1.OTY_TYPE, T2.DUE_DT, T2.CREATED_TMST, T4.NUMB, T4.TYPE, T4.PAT_ESTAB_IND, T4.DATE_PATERN_ESTAB, T5.PRIM_SEC_CD from CKT_CSE_PERSON T4 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_OBLIGATION T5 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_OB_TRN T1 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_DEBT_DTL T2 with(readuncommitted) on (T2.DUE_DT between cast(@date1 as date) and cast(@date2 as date)) and T2.CREATED_TMST <= @createdTmst and T1.OTY_TYPE = T2.OTY_TYPE and T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID = T2.OBG_GENERATED_ID and T1.OB_TRN_TYP = T2.OTR_TYPE and T1.OB_TRN_ID = T2.OTR_GENERATED_ID and T1.CPA_TYPE = T2.CPA_TYPE and T1.CSP_NUMBER = T2.CSP_NUMBER and T1.CREATED_TMST <= @createdTmst and T1.OB_TRN_TYP = 'DE' and T1.CPA_SUP_TYPE = 'S' on T5.DTY_GENERATED_ID = T1.OTY_TYPE and T5.OB_ID = T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID and T5.CSP_NUMBER = T1.CSP_NUMBER and T5.CPA_TYPE = T1.CPA_TYPE and T5.PRIM_SEC_CD <> 'S' and T5.DTY_GENERATED_ID = @dtyGeneratedId and T5.CSP_NUMBER > @cspNumber and T5.CPA_TYPE = 'R' on T4.NUMB = T1.CSP_SUP_NUMBER order by T1.CSP_NUMBER

data.name: ReadObligationType
data.value: select DEBT_TYP_ID, DEBT_TYP_CD, EFFECTIVE_DT, DISCONTINUE_DT from CKT_OB_TYPE where DEBT_TYP_CD = 'CS' and EFFECTIVE_DT <= @effectiveDt and DISCONTINUE_DT >= @effectiveDt

data.name: UpdateDashboardStagingPriority1
data.value: update CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI_4 set CS_DUE_AMT = @csDueAmt where REPORT_MONTH = @reportMonth and RUN_NUMBER = @runNumber and CASE_NUMBER = @caseNumber

data.name: UpdateDashboardStagingPriority2
data.value: update CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI_4 set CS_COLLECTED_AMT = @csCollectedAmt where REPORT_MONTH = @reportMonth and RUN_NUMBER = @runNumber and CASE_NUMBER = @caseNumber

data.name: UpdateDashboardStagingPriority3
data.value: update CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI_4 set PAYING_CASE_IND = @payingCaseInd where REPORT_MONTH = @reportMonth and RUN_NUMBER = @runNumber and CASE_NUMBER = @caseNumber

data.name: UpdateDashboardStagingPriority5
data.value: update CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI_4 set PATERNITY_EST_IND = @paternityEstInd where REPORT_MONTH = @reportMonth and RUN_NUMBER = @runNumber and CASE_NUMBER = @caseNumber
